summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Elite Tier features. All 29 backend API tests passed (100%). Tested: Custom ARRIS Workflows (CRUD + run), Brand Integrations (CRUD + analytics), Elite Dashboard (config + data with 8 widgets), Adaptive Intelligence (profile + recommendations + refresh), and Elite Status endpoint. Feature gating verified - non-Elite users get 403 with proper error messages.
passed_tests: Elite user login successful
Pro user login successful
GET /api/elite/status requires authentication
GET /api/elite/status returns is_elite=true and all elite features for Elite user
GET /api/elite/status returns is_elite=false and upgrade_url for Pro user
GET /api/elite/workflows returns 403 for non-Elite users with feature_gated error
POST /api/elite/workflows returns 403 for non-Elite users
GET /api/elite/workflows returns workflows list with default_workflow for Elite user
POST /api/elite/workflows creates workflow with WF- prefix ID for Elite user
GET /api/elite/workflows/{id} returns specific workflow
PUT /api/elite/workflows/{id} updates workflow
DELETE /api/elite/workflows/{id} deletes workflow and returns 404 on re-fetch
POST /api/elite/workflows/{id}/run executes workflow on proposal
GET /api/elite/brands returns 403 for non-Elite users with feature_gated error
POST /api/elite/brands returns 403 for non-Elite users
GET /api/elite/brands returns integrations with analytics summary for Elite user
POST /api/elite/brands creates brand with BRAND- prefix ID and arris_recommendation_score
GET /api/elite/brands/{id} returns specific brand with arris_recommendation_score
PUT /api/elite/brands/{id} updates brand status and deal_value
DELETE /api/elite/brands/{id} deletes brand and returns 404 on re-fetch
GET /api/elite/dashboard returns 403 for non-Elite users with feature_gated error
GET /api/elite/dashboard returns config with 8+ widgets and data for Elite user
PUT /api/elite/dashboard updates dashboard name, theme, and brand_colors
GET /api/elite/adaptive-intelligence returns 403 for non-Elite users
GET /api/elite/adaptive-intelligence returns profile and recommendations for Elite user
POST /api/elite/adaptive-intelligence/refresh rebuilds profile with learning_score
GET /api/elite/brands/analytics/summary returns pipeline and status_breakdown
GET /api/subscriptions/feature-access shows tier=elite and custom_arris_workflows=true for Elite user
GET /api/subscriptions/feature-access shows custom_arris_workflows=false for Pro user
seed_data_creation: Elite user (elite@poweruser.com) has Elite subscription with all Elite features enabled. Has 3 proposals for testing workflows.

elite_status_endpoint.elite_user: Returns is_elite=true, tier='elite', all elite_features enabled - VERIFIED

custom_arris_workflows.crud_operations: Create, Read, Update, Delete all working - VERIFIED
custom_arris_workflows.workflow_run: Executes workflow on proposal with base_insights and workflow_enhancements - VERIFIED

brand_integrations.crud_operations: Create, Read, Update, Delete all working - VERIFIED
brand_integrations.analytics_summary: Returns total_brands, pipeline, status_breakdown, deal_types, avg_deal_value - VERIFIED

elite_dashboard.default_widgets: 8 widgets created by default (metric_card, chart_line, brand_pipeline, arris_insights, activity_feed) - VERIFIED
elite_dashboard.config_update: Name, theme, brand_colors can be updated - VERIFIED

adaptive_intelligence.refresh: Rebuilds profile from proposal history - VERIFIED

mocked_apis.brand_fit_scores: Calculated algorithm based on platform overlap and deal value - MOCKED
mocked_apis.monetization_estimates: Calculated based on platforms and proposal data - MOCKED

context_for_next_testing_agent: Elite Tier features fully implemented and tested. Elite user (elite@poweruser.com) has access to: 1) Custom ARRIS Workflows - save/run custom analysis templates with focus areas like growth_strategy, monetization, brand_partnerships 2) Brand Integrations - track brand partnerships with pipeline analytics and arris_recommendation_score 3) Elite Dashboard - 8 configurable widgets with brand colors 4) Adaptive Intelligence - learns from creator history to provide personalized recommendations. All endpoints return 403 with feature_gated error for non-Elite users. Test file: /app/tests/test_elite_features.py
